title: Chickasaw National Recreation Area: Goods & Services
body: Goods & Services       The nearby communities of Sulphur and Davis, offer most common goods & services, including boat and vehicle storage, boat, RV, and automobile repair, and other recreation-related services.      Boat Rentals and Lake Supplies  Shady Oaks Boat Rental FOR RESERVATIONS CALL: 580-622-6120 Shady Oaks Boat Rental at The Point boat ramp.       Food and beverage service  Minner Hut  Carry-out to the Guy Sandy Boat Ramp Chopped beef sandwiches, onion burgers, and beverages. 580 622-3386 1303 Chickasaw Trail       The National Park Service provides the names and phone numbers of these businesses as a visitor convenience and inclusion does not constitute an endorsement or guarantee of services. Contact Sulphur Chamber of Commerce for more information about area businesses. 580-622-2824
